items.question: What kind of images can I restore?
items.answer: You can restore any facial images, including personal photos, professional headshots, and scanned images. The AI functions best on clear, well-lit images but can also improve lower-quality pictures.

items.question: How are restored images different from traditional editing?
items.answer: Our AI offers rapid, consistent results that retain natural facial features, unlike traditional methods that may lead to over-editing or unrealistic looks.

items.question: Can I adjust the intensity of the restoration?
items.answer: Yes! You can select different levels of enhancement, from subtle improvements to dramatic restorations, ensuring the result matches your vision.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can process?
items.answer: No, you can restore multiple images at once. Our platform allows batch processing for efficient use, saving you time.

items.question: What file types do you support for uploads?
items.answer: We support various formats including JPG, PNG, and TIFF. Ensure your images are clear for optimal results.

items.question: How long does the restoration process take?
items.answer: The restoration usually takes just a few seconds. You'll receive results quickly so you can proceed with your projects without delay.

items.question: Do I get commercial rights for the restored images?
items.answer: Absolutely! All restored images come with full commercial usage rights without additional fees.

items.question: What support options are available for troubleshooting?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support via documentation, tutorials, and live chat. Our dedicated team is ready to assist within 24 hours for any issues.
